agenda_items.description: To consider signing of Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between Department of Higher Education, Ministry of Education, Govt. of India & NIT Agartala for the year 2022-23 as per requirement of GFR 229(xi)
agenda_items.decision: Approved for signing as per suggestions received from MoE, Govt. of India, Department of Higher Education, IFD vide letter F. No. 3-9/2021-IFD (Pt.), dated: 01.04.2022

signatories.name: Prof. (Dr.) H.K. Sharma
signatories.role: Chairperson of BoG and Director, NIT Agartala
